00008 LocalFile::LocalFile(const char* Path)
00009 {
00010     m_localName = 0;
00011     m_localFilePath = 0;
00012 
00013     if (Path != 0)
00014     {
00015 
00016         m_localFilePath = new char[strlen(Path) + 1];
00017         strncpy(m_localFilePath, Path, strlen(Path) + 1);
00018 
00019         const char* lastSlash = strrchr(Path, '/');
00020 
00021         if (lastSlash == 0)
00022         {
00023             lastSlash = Path;
00024         }
00025         else
00026         {
00027             //Increment by 1 to remove the / from the string
00028             lastSlash++;
00029         }
00030 
00031         m_localName = new char[ strlen(lastSlash) + 1 ];
00032         strncpy(m_localName, lastSlash, strlen(lastSlash) + 1);
00033 
00034     }
00035 }

00047 
00048     if (m_localName != 0)
00049     {
00050         delete[] m_localName;
00051         m_localName = 0;
00052     }
00053 
00054     return;
00055 }

00067 bool LocalFile::exists()
00068 {
00069 
00070   struct stat fileInfo;
00071 
00072   //If stat returns 0 something by that name exists
00073   if (stat(m_localFilePath, &fileInfo) == 0)
00074     return true;
00075 
00076   return false;
00077 }

00079 unsigned long LocalFile::length()
